sentences.en: Francis of Assisi in the 12 th - century, who used them in his church Nativity - Plays.
sentences.cn: 在12世纪时, 颂歌广泛流行,圣法兰西斯用这些颂歌在他的教会上演奏.

sentences.en: I have just visited the place of my nativity.
sentences.cn: 我刚去过我出生的地方.

sentences.en: I have served him from the hour of my nativity to this instant.
sentences.cn: 我从出生到现在一直侍奉着他.

sentences.en: I serve him from the hour of my nativity to this instant.
sentences.cn: 我从出生到现在一直侍奉著他.

sentences.en: In the box was another treasure, remarkably untouched: our nativity set.
sentences.cn: 箱子里还有另外一件宝物,保存得完好无损, 令人惊叹: 那是我们的出生纪念套册.

sentences.en: Merchants sell figurines for nativity scenes , toys, warm sweaters and other specialties of Salzburg.
sentences.cn: 商人兜售着耶稣降生故事相关的小雕像 、 玩具 、 保暖的羊毛衫及其他萨尔兹堡的特产.

sentences.en: The baby's nativity brought them great pleasure.
sentences.cn: 孩子的诞生给他们带来了巨大的欢乐.

sentences.en: The broadcast will show the queen, wearing a green outfit, chatting to schoolchildren as she helps them make a collage of a nativity scene.
sentences.cn: 人们将在电视上看到女王身着绿色套装，一边和小学生们谈心，一边教他们拼贴“耶稣降生”的场景。

sentences.en: The children always perform a nativity play every Christmas.
sentences.cn: 每年圣诞节孩子们都演耶稣诞生的戏剧.

sentences.en: The design of advertisement should develop nativity and propose originality.
sentences.cn: 我国的招贴广告设计要挖掘本土、倡导原创.

sentences.en: They admired the tableau of the Nativity.
sentences.cn: 他们欣赏着耶稣降生的场景造型。

sentences.en: They say there is divinity in odd numbers , either in nativity, chance, or death. Away!
sentences.cn: 人家说单数是有神奇力量的,是用来占卜生死 、 机缘的, 去吧!

sentences.en: Who played Mary in the nativity play?
sentences.cn: 谁扮演耶稣降生戏里的玛利亚?

words.tran_cn: 本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的
出生；出生地；（Nativity）耶稣的诞生

trans.tran_cn: （尤指）基督的诞生，圣诞节，出生
trans.tran_en: birth or origin, esp in relation to the circumstances surrounding it
